definition[0]: the soft part of the body of a person or animal that is between the skin and the bones
example[0]: a freshwater fish with firm white flesh
definition[1]: the skin of the human body
example[1]: His flesh was red and covered in sores.
definition[2]: the soft part of a fruit or vegetable that can be eaten
example[2]: Cut the melon in half and scoop out the flesh.
